text: Christian Kreienbühl (born 6 June 1981) is a Swiss long distance runner who specialises in the marathon. He competed in the men's marathon event at the 2016 Summer Olympics. In 2018, he competed in the men's marathon at the 2018 European Athletics Championships held in Berlin, Germany. He finished in 27th place. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Swiss male long-distance runners Category:Swiss male marathon runners Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic athletes of Switzerland
title: Christian Kreienbühl
